description: Marius Daugelavičius – Psychologist, Doctor of Philosophy (PhD), member of Psychology Association. Marius Daugelavicius leads personality development and business seminars in Vilnius, Tallinn, Riga, S.Peterburge, Moscow, Kiev and others. Since 2005, conducted over 120 seminars, attended by about 2,000 people. The seminar will discuss the four athletic fields of life: work (sports activities), family, personal inner world of the human and the environment. Theoretical and practical examples of listeners lecturer will explain how to achieve a balance between these areas. It will provide practical methods for creating psychologically balanced athlete’s life, deal with psychological crises or to mitigate them.
title: Sport psychology The Balance of sportsman's life
